EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_VMworld_Exec_Reception_Q314.NorthAm_Event_VMworld_Exec_Reception_Q
EmailTemplate.subject: You are Confirmed - VMWorld Executive Reception
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thanks for registering for the Pivotal and VMW Executive Reception.
The Pivotal offices are located at 875 Howard Street on the 4th floor in San Francisco (across the street from Moscone West).
We are looking forward to seeing you there Tuesday, 8/26 @ 5:00PM. If you have any questions, do not hesitate to contact us at info@pivotal.io.
Regards,
The VMW and Pivotal Teams
